scripts.start:dev: cross-env env=Development uv pip install . && python manage.py runserver
scripts.start:prd: cross-env env=Production uv pip install . && python manage.py runserver
scripts.deploy: npm install && cross-env env=dev python -m scripts.generate_serverless_config && sh -c 'env=dev sh scripts/container_deploy.sh' && cross-env AWS_PROFILE=default sls deploy --stage=dev
scripts.deploy:prd: npm install && cross-env env=prd python -m scripts.generate_serverless_config && sh -c 'env=prd sh scripts/container_deploy.sh' && cross-env AWS_PROFILE=default sls deploy --stage=prd
